keyMoments.title: Encounters Yama, the Chief Enforcer
keyMoments.description: Robin encounters Yama while exploring the ancient ruins. Yama attacks her and begins destroying the historical monuments.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's combat abilities and her dedication to preserving historical artifacts.

keyMoments.title: Uses Veinte Fleur: Calendula
keyMoments.description: Robin uses Veinte Fleur: Calendula to create a defensive shield protecting the ancient monuments from Yama's attacks.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of this defensive technique, showcasing Robin's Devil Fruit versatility.

keyMoments.title: Uses Treinta Fleur: Hang
keyMoments.description: Robin uses Treinta Fleur: Hang to catch Yama mid-air and slam him down.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's increased offensive capability with her Devil Fruit powers.

keyMoments.title: Uses Cien Fleur: Delphinium
keyMoments.description: Robin defeats Yama using Cien Fleur: Delphinium, sprouting one hundred arms to roll him off a cliff.
keyMoments.significance: Debut of one of Robin's most powerful pre-timeskip techniques.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Yama
keyMoments.description: Robin successfully defeats Yama, the Chief Enforcer, using her Devil Fruit abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Major solo victory establishing Robin as a capable combatant.

keyMoments.title: Discovers the City of Gold, Shandora
keyMoments.description: Robin discovers the legendary lost city of Shandora by descending through the cloud layer, revealing the magnificent golden ruins.
keyMoments.significance: Major discovery of the legendary City of Gold that confirms the myths were true.

keyMoments.title: Finds the Shandorian Poneglyph
keyMoments.description: Robin discovers a Poneglyph in Shandora and realizes the city was destroyed fighting to protect it.
keyMoments.significance: Links Shandora to the Void Century and True History, advancing the overarching plot.
keyMoments.quote: The City of Gold, Shandora... They fought to protect the Poneglyph.

abilities.description: Robin sprouts twenty arms that spread outward to create a defensive shield capable of blocking attacks and protecting objects.
Robin sprouts thirty arms from high positions to catch opponents mid-air and slam them against surfaces.
Robin sprouts one hundred arms that create a path to systematically roll opponents, often combined with Clutch to finish them.

reveals.information: Discovers the legendary City of Gold, Shandora, beneath the cloud layer
Finds the Shandorian Poneglyph and learns that Shandora was destroyed protecting it

keyMoments.title: Battles Robin in the Ruins
keyMoments.description: Yama, as Chief Enforcer, attacks Robin in the ancient ruins, destroying monuments without care.
keyMoments.significance: Represents Enel's destructive forces with no regard for ancient history.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Robin
keyMoments.description: Yama is defeated by Robin's Cien Fleur: Delphinium technique and falls from a cliff.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's combat prowess and removes one of Enel's powerful enforcers.

keyMoments.title: Tests Refurbished Waver
keyMoments.description: Nami receives and tests a refurbished Waver from Pagaya, impressed by its power from the rare Jet Dial.
keyMoments.significance: Shows alliance with Skypieans and introduces upgraded equipment for upcoming events.

keyMoments.title: Trapped Inside Giant Snake
keyMoments.description: Luffy remains trapped inside Nola the giant snake, trying to find his way out while extremely hungry.
keyMoments.significance: Comedic subplot showing Luffy's obliviousness and persistence.

keyMoments.title: Befriends a South Bird
keyMoments.description: While taking a lunch break, Zoro is approached by a South Bird that becomes interested in him and decides to follow him.
keyMoments.significance: Light-hearted character moment showing Zoro's ability to attract unusual companions.

keyMoments.title: Helps Aboard the Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Conis is aboard the Going Merry with her father Pagaya and Aisa, helping Nami and the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the alliance between the Straw Hats and Skypieans.

keyMoments.title: Presents Refurbished Waver to Nami
keyMoments.description: Pagaya gives Nami a refurbished Waver powered by a rare Jet Dial, demonstrating his engineering skills.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Pagaya's technical expertise and the value of the Straw Hat-Skypiean alliance.

reveals.information: Demonstrates advanced engineering skills by refurbishing the Waver with a rare Jet Dial

keyMoments.title: Aboard the Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Aisa is aboard the Going Merry after being saved from sky sharks by Conis and Pagaya.
keyMoments.significance: Her Mantra (Observation Haki) makes her valuable for sensing danger.
